description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的公安政法类本科院校。其历史可追溯至1949年成立的南京市公安学校，后经历多次更名与合并，于2002年正式成立为江苏警官学院。
description.en: A public security and political science undergraduate institution located in Nanjing, Jiangsu, China. Its history dates back to the Nanjing Public Security School established in 1949. After several name changes and mergers, it was officially established as the Jiangsu Police Institute in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 江苏警官学院党委书记。
description.en: Secretary of the Party Committee of Jiangsu Police Institute.

description.zh-cn: 江苏警官学院院长。
description.en: Rector of Jiangsu Police Institute.

description.zh-cn: 江苏警官学院的前身，成立于1949年6月。
description.en: The predecessor of Jiangsu Police Institute, established in June 1949.

description.zh-cn: 江苏警官学院的前身，由南京市公安学校于1953年8月更名而来。
description.en: The predecessor of Jiangsu Police Institute, renamed from Nanjing Public Security School in August 1953.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场政治运动，期间江苏省公安学校教学中断。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which teaching at the Jiangsu Provincial Public Security School was interrupted.

description.zh-cn: 江苏警官学院的前身，为全国第一所公安专科学校。
description.en: The predecessor of Jiangsu Police Institute, and the first public security junior college in China.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月合并入江苏公安专科学校的学校。
description.en: A school that was merged into Jiangsu Public Security College in September 1998.

description.zh-cn: 2000年6月合并入江苏公安专科学校的学校。
description.en: A school that was merged into Jiangsu Public Security College in June 2000.

nodes.id: 江苏公安管理干部学院

zh-cn: 江苏公安管理干部学院
en: Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College

description.zh-cn: 江苏警官学院增挂的牌子，为同一机构。
description.en: An additional nameplate for Jiangsu Police Institute; they are the same institution.

nodes.id: 江苏省公安派出所长学校

zh-cn: 江苏省公安派出所长学校

description.zh-cn: 江苏公安管理干部学院下设的学校。
description.en: A school established under the Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College.

nodes.id: 江苏省公安刑警队长学校

zh-cn: 江苏省公安刑警队长学校

description.zh-cn: 江苏公安管理干部学院下设的学校。
description.en: A school established under the Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College.

nodes.id: 江苏省公安交巡警队长学校

zh-cn: 江苏省公安交巡警队长学校

description.zh-cn: 江苏公安管理干部学院下设的学校。
description.en: A school established under the Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，夏存喜是江苏警官学院的党委书记。
description.en: According to the infobox, Xia Cunxi is the Secretary of the Party Committee of Jiangsu Police Institute.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，黄进是江苏警官学院的院长。
description.en: According to the infobox, Huang Jin is the Rector of Jiangsu Police Institute.

description.zh-cn: 1953年8月，南京市公安学校更名为江苏省公安学校。
description.en: In August 1953, Nanjing Public Security School was renamed Jiangsu Provincial Public Security School.

description.zh-cn: 受文化大革命影响，江苏省公安学校教学中断，直至1978年8月才恢复。
description.en: Affected by the Cultural Revolution, teaching at the Jiangsu Provincial Public Security School was interrupted and did not resume until August 1978.

description.zh-cn: 1982年10月，在江苏省公安学校的基础上成立了江苏公安专科学校。
description.en: In October 1982, Jiangsu Public Security College was established on the basis of Jiangsu Provincial Public Security School.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月，江苏省人民警察学校合并入江苏公安专科学校。
description.en: In September 1998, Jiangsu Provincial People's Police School was merged into Jiangsu Public Security College.

description.zh-cn: 2000年6月，江苏省司法学校合并入江苏公安专科学校。
description.en: In June 2000, Jiangsu Provincial Judicial School was merged into Jiangsu Public Security College.

description.zh-cn: 2002年3月，在江苏公安专科学校的基础上成立了江苏警官学院。
description.en: In March 2002, Jiangsu Police Institute was established on the basis of Jiangsu Public Security College.

relationships.target: 江苏公安管理干部学院

description.zh-cn: 自2004年3月起，江苏警官学院增挂江苏公安管理干部学院牌子，两者为同一机构。
description.en: Since March 2004, Jiangsu Police Institute has also used the nameplate of Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College; they are the same institution.

relationships.source: 江苏省公安派出所长学校
relationships.target: 江苏公安管理干部学院

description.zh-cn: 江苏省公安派出所长学校是江苏公安管理干部学院下设的机构。
description.en: Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Police Station Chiefs School is an institution under the Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省公安刑警队长学校是江苏公安管理干部学院下设的机构。
description.en: Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Criminal Police Captains School is an institution under the Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College.

relationships.target: 江苏公安管理干部学院

description.zh-cn: 江苏省公安交巡警队长学校是江苏公安管理干部学院下设的机构。
description.en: Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Traffic and Patrol Police Captains School is an institution under the Jiangsu Public Security Management Cadre College.
